document.full_text: the two candidates in peru's tight presidential contest traded barbs in a heated televised debate a week before the election, each trying to paint the other as bad for democracy.
document.title: peru candidates tussle in debate as race tightens
lines_and_colors: the two candidates in peru's tight presidential contest traded barbs in a heated televised debate a week before the election, each trying to paint the other as bad for democracy.
